alert.note: Alert for Central and East Adams and Arapahoe Counties; Elbert, Central and East Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet; North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 2:57PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Arapahoe and central Adams Counties through 345 PM MDT... At 254 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles north of Manila Village to 7 miles east of Arapahoe Park, or along a line extending from 38 miles south of Greeley to 22 miles east of Denver. Movement was north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Eastern Aurora, eastern Denver International Airport, Bennett, Watkins, Byers, Manila Village and Strasburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare for sudden gusty winds. Secure loose objects and move to a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
